Name: Until Last Breath
About the game: I making the game on my own ( Mario Murkl ) : The Until Last Breath is a survival action game with multiple guns and character skins on a rework map. The game is use the Unreal Engine 4 I work alone, the whole map in the game is a remake, to being playable. The game is cost me lot of Energy and Work , i would like to sell it for really competitive price. The game is running on Windows 10 64bit, there is no Linux support at all, it could change this in the future. Story In your dream suddenly you find yourself in a research facility, with zombie hordes and they are coming in waves. Inspired from Killing Floor, but only on 1 map, which will be reworked a few times when the seasons are comes up. If you have any question , feel free to ask. The music under the Trailer / Game brought The Holdt Band. Regards Mario Murkl
